mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sq.PRJ_ID , sq.SRV_STS , p.PRJ_NAME , p.CLNT_INFO , p.DEPT_ID , p.PRJ_STS , TO_CHAR(p.STRT_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD') STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(p.END_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD') END_DT , d.DEPT_NAME FROM SURVEY_QUESTION sq JOIN PROJECT p ON p.PRJ_ID = sq.PRJ_ID JOIN DEPARTMENT d ON d.DEPT_ID = p.DEPT_ID WHERE p.DEL_YN = 'N'
